item.title: Sam Brown - Stop
item.description:
All that I have is all
that you’ve give me
Did you never worry
that I’d come
To depend on you
I gave you all
The love I had in me
now I find you’ve lied
And I can’t believe
it’s true
Wrapped in her arms
I see you across
The street
I can’t help
But wonder
if she knows
What’s going on
oh- you talk of love
But you don’t know
how it feels
When you realise
that you’re not
The only one
oh- you’d better stop
Before you tear me
all apart
You’d better stop
before you go and
Break my heart
woo- you’d better stop
Time after time
I’ve tried to
Walk away
but it’s not that easy
When you soul
is torn in two
So I just resign
myself to it every day
Now all I can do
is to leave
It up to you
oh- you’d better stop
Before you tear me
all apart
You’d better stop
before you go and
Break my heart woo-
you’d better stop
If you love me now’s
the time to be sorry
I won’t believe
that you’d walk
Out on me
baby- yeah- oh-

Oh- you’d better stop
before you
Tear me all apart
you’d better stop
Before you go and
break my heart
Woo- you’d better stop
baby stop
Oh- you’d better stop
you’d better stop
Baby stop baby stop
you’d better
You’d better
you’d better
Stop stop
stop stop
You’d better yeah
you’d better
Woo- you’d better stop
you’d better
You’d better stop
you’d better
You’d better oh
you’d better
Woo- you’d better stop
you’d better
Oh you’d better
woo- you’d better
You’d better
you’d better-
